title: Weekly Chagrin Falls Area Real Estate Market Activity Update
posting_body: South Russell Village Council had a special meeting on Friday, 06/17/22 at 8:00 AM.
Hudson City Council had an executive session meeting to interview manager applicants on Friday, 06/17/22 from 6:00 PM to 8:30 PM.
Reminderville "Family Fun Day" event occurred on the same day from 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM.
City of Aurora Fishing Derby event occurred on Saturday, 06/18/22.
South Russell "Geauga Fresh Farmers Market.
event occurred on the same day at 9:00 AM.
"More in The Hills "Yoga in the Pavilion" event occurred on the same day from 9:00 AM to 10 :00 AM at the pavilion at the Forrest Ridge.
Reminderville "Family Fun Day" event occurred on the same day from 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM Sunday, 06/19/22 was the Fathers Day.
Juneteenth National Independence Day celebration occurred on the same day.
Monday, 06/20/22 was the Juneteenth.
Moreland Hills Charter Review Commission had a meeting on the same day from 7:00 PM to 8:30 PM.
Village of Chagrin Falls Planning & Zoning Commission had a meeting on Monday, 06/20/22 at 7:00 PM.
Village of Chagrin Falls Architectural Board of  Review had a meeting on Tuesday, 06/21/22 at 8:30 AM.
Hudson City Council had a meeting on the same day from 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM.
Bainbridge Board of Trustees had a meeting on Wednesday, 06/22/22 at 4:00 PM.
Aurora Civil Service Commission had a meeting on the same day at 6:30 PM.
Village of Bentleyville Finance Committee had a meeting on the same day from 6:30 PM to 7:00 PM.
Russell Township Zoning Commission had a meeting on the same day at 7:00 PM.
Hudson Architectural & Historic Board of Review had a meeting on the same day from 7:30 PM to 11:00 PM Bentleyville City Council had a meeting on the same day from 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM.
Aurora Civil Service Commission had a meeting on the same day at 6:30 PM.
Moreland Hills "More in the Hills" events occurred on Thursday, 06/23/22.
Aurora Architectural Board of Review had a meeting on Thursday, 06/23/22 at 5:00 PM.
There was a low level of activity on the Bainbridge and on the Chagrin Falls area real estate market this week.
4 single family homes and 2 condominiums were listed for sale.
4 single family home listings changed to contract.
The price was reduced to 4 single family homes.
3 single family home listing and 2 condominium listings began awaiting sale.
1 single family home listing began awaiting rental.
9 single family homes and 1 two family home were sold.
1 single family home listing was placed temporary off market.
1 single family home listing expired.
